span.span: Represents an object that describes the customizations to the non-client area of a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使你能够将 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 内容扩展到通常为操作系统的窗口管理器保留窗口的非工作区。The class enables you to extend Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content into the non-client area of a window that is typically reserved for the operating system’s window manager. ## 标准的 WindowsStandard Windows 标准 windows 组成两个重叠的矩形。Standard windows are composed of two overlapping rectangles. 外部矩形是*非工作区*，这通常称为*chrome*。The outer rectangle is the *non-client area*, which is often referred to as *chrome*. 进行绘制和由操作系统的窗口管理器管理。It is drawn and managed by the operating system’s window manager. 其尺寸取决于标准操作系统设置。Its dimensions are determined by standard operating system settings. 非客户端框架提供标准窗口功能和行为。The non-client frame provides standard window features and behaviors. 其中包括 （最小化、 最大化和关闭） 的标题按钮的窗口边框，调整和移动行为、 应用程序图标和标题和系统菜单。These include caption buttons (Minimize, Maximize, and Close), the window border, resize and move behaviors, the application icon and title, and the system menu. 内部矩形*客户端区域*。The inner rectangle is the *client area*. 它包含内容的应用程序，并且会绘制和在应用程序管理。It contains the contents of your application, and it is drawn and managed by the application. 有关 WPF 应用程序中的时段的详细信息，请参阅[WPF Windows 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-windows-overview.md)。For more information about windows in WPF applications, see [WPF Windows Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-windows-overview.md). 下图显示标准窗口的部分。The following illustration shows the parts of a standard window. ![窗口元素](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "窗口元素")![Window elements](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "Window elements") ## 自定义 WindowsCustom Windows 可以通过设置自定义窗口边框属性或通过使用类。You can customize a window border by setting the property to or by using the class. ### WindowStyle.NoneWindowStyle.None 自定义 WPF 应用程序窗口的外观的一种方法是将设置属性。One way to customize the appearance of a WPF application window is to set the property to . 这从窗口中删除非客户端框架并离开仅客户端区域中，可以向其应用自定义样式。This removes the non-client frame from the window and leaves only the client area, to which you can apply a custom style. 但是，在删除非客户端框架后，你也会失去系统功能和提供，如标题按钮和重设窗口大小的行为。However, when the non-client frame is removed, you also lose the system features and behaviors that it provides, such as caption buttons and window resizing. 另一个副作用是它最大化时，窗口将介绍 Windows 任务栏。Another side effect is that the window will cover the Windows taskbar when it is maximized. 设置使您能够创建完全自定义应用程序，但也需要应用程序模拟标准窗口行为中实现自定义逻辑。Setting enables you to create a completely custom application, but also requires that you implement custom logic in your application to emulate standard window behavior. ### WindowChromeWindowChrome 若要自定义窗口，同时保留其标准功能，可以使用类。To customize a window while retaining its standard functionality, you can use the class. 类窗口框架的功能分离开来视觉对象，并允许您控制的客户端和应用程序窗口的非工作区之间的边界。The class separates the functionality of the window frame from the visuals, and lets you control the boundary between the client and non-client areas of your application window. 类可由扩展以涵盖的非工作区的客户端区域放 WPF 窗口框架中的内容。The class lets you put WPF content in the window frame by extending the client area to cover the non-client area. 同时，它将保留通过两个不可见区域; 的系统行为*调整边框的大小*和*标题*区域。At the same time, it retains system behaviors through two invisible areas; the *resize border* and *caption* areas . 有两个主要部分： 创建自定义窗口使用类。There are two main parts to creating a custom window using the class. 首先，你要自定义窗口的非客户端部分通过设置属性上公开对象。First, you customize the non-client part of the window by setting properties exposed on the object. 然后，你为定义的应用程序扩展到非工作区一部分的窗口提供模板。上公开的属性对象， ， ，和 .Then you provide a template for the window that defines the part of your application that is extended into the non-client area.The properties exposed on the object are , , , and . 属性指定应用程序窗口，以便用户可以单击并拖动以调整大小窗口周围不可见边框。The property specifies an invisible border around the outside of the application window that the user can click-and-drag to resize the window. 属性指定顶部的窗口，使系统行为通常与标题栏的可见区域。The property specifies an invisible area at the top of the window that enables system behaviors typically associated with the title bar. 这些行为包括： 单击并拖动以移动该窗口中，双击以最大化窗口，然后右键单击即可显示系统菜单。These behaviors include: click and drag to move the window, double-click to maximize the window, and right-click to show the system menu. 大小调整边框和标题区域没有任何视觉元素，则它们仅定义响应输入并启用标准系统提供的窗口行为的区域。The resize border and caption area do not have any visual elements; they only define areas that respond to input and enable standard system-provided window behaviors. 属性指定窗口的角变圆的量。The property specifies the amount that the corners of the window are rounded. 此属性没有任何影响，如果玻璃框架窗口启用了。This property does not have any effect if the glass frame is enabled for a window. 属性指定的窗口周围的玻璃框的宽度。The property specifies the width of the glass frame around the window. 默认情况下，它使用指定的系统值属性来模拟的标准窗口的外观。By default, it uses the system value specified by the property to emulate the appearance of a standard window. 当使用玻璃框时，最小化、 最大化和关闭的标题按钮可见且交互式。When the glass frame is used, the caption buttons for Minimize, Maximize, and Close are visible and interactive. 应用程序负责显示应用程序图标和标题文本。The application is responsible for displaying the application icon and caption text. 你可以设置属性以使更宽或窄而不是默认的玻璃框。You can set the property to make the glass frame wider or narrower than the default. > [!CAUTION] > 标题按钮的大小不会更改时属性更改。The size of the caption buttons does not change when the property is changed. 如果顶部的玻璃框的高度小于标题按钮的高度，标题按钮将不完全可见。If the height of the top of the glass frame is less than the height of the caption buttons, the caption buttons will not be completely visible. 若要使不具有玻璃框架自定义窗口，请设置为统一值 0 的属性。To make a custom window that does not have a glass frame, set the property to a uniform value of 0. 这将禁用并隐藏的标准标题按钮。This will disable and hide the standard caption buttons. 若要扩展以涵盖整个窗口的玻璃框，设置为负值在任意一侧的属性。To extend the glass frame to cover the entire window, set the property to a negative value on any side. 当属性设置为任何一侧为负值，其强制转换后的值将等于。When the property is set to a negative value for any side, its coerced value will be equal to . > [!NOTE] > Aero 是一组对外观 visual 增强功能和 Windows Vista 中引入的 Windows 桌面的功能。Aero is a set of visual enhancements to the look and functionality of the Windows desktop that was introduced in Windows Vista. Aero 的更直观功能之一是透明的玻璃窗口边框。One of the more visually obvious features of Aero is translucent glass window borders. 桌面合成功能的桌面窗口管理器 (DWM) 通过启用 Windows Aero。Windows Aero is enabled by the desktop composition feature of the Desktop Window Manager (DWM). Windows Aero 玻璃效果不支持在所有操作系统上，可支持的操作系统上禁用。Windows Aero glass effects are not supported on all operating systems, and can be disabled on supported operating systems. 如果 Windows Aero 不可用，将不会玻璃框显示而不考虑属性值。If Windows Aero is not available, the glass frame will not be displayed regardless of the property value. 此属性指定的边框区域将显示为黑色。检查属性以验证是否提供了 Windows Aero 玻璃效果。The border area specified by this property will appear black instead.Check the property to verify that Windows Aero glass effects are available. 如果玻璃效果不可用，则应提供一种不使用玻璃框或使用标准的窗口的窗口样式设置为 null 的备用的窗口样式。If glass effects are not available, you should provide an alternate window style that does not use the glass frame or use the standard window by setting the window style to null. 通过指定定义的外观和行为的帧内容 ControlTemplate 可将你的 WPF 内容扩展到窗口框架中。You extend your WPF content into the window frame by specifying a ControlTemplate that defines the appearance and behavior of the frame content. 设置的 ControlTemplate TargetType 为您要自定义窗口的类型。You set the TargetType of the ControlTemplate to the type of the window that you are customizing. ``` ``` 默认情况下，任何窗口的非客户端区域内的可视元素的部分都不是交互式的。By default, the parts of any visual elements that are within the non-client area of the window are not interactive. 若要启用交互元素的非工作区中，将附加的 WindowsChrome.IsHitTestVisibleInChrome 属性附加到元素，并将其设置为 true。To enable interactive elements in the non-client area, attach the WindowsChrome.IsHitTestVisibleInChrome attached property to the element and set it to true. 下面的 XAML 标记显示自定义使用 WindowChrome 类窗口所需的主要元素。The following XAML markup shows the main elements needed to customize a window using the WindowChrome class. ``` ``` 第一个 setter 将 WindowChrome 附加到窗口。The first setter attaches the WindowChrome to the window. 它使用所有默认值对于 WindowChrome 属性中，这使得如下所示的标准窗口的窗口。It uses all default values for the WindowChrome properties, which makes the window look like a standard window. ``` ``` 窗口模板必须指定内容的显示器，用以显示你的应用程序中指定的窗口的内容。The window template must specify a content presenter to display the contents of the window specified in your application. 默认情况下 WindowChrome 类扩展的工作区以涵盖非客户端边框。By default the WindowChrome class extends the client area to cover the non-client border. 为了发现玻璃框架，你需要指定边距 ContentPresenter。In order to uncover the glass frame, you need to specify a margin around the ContentPresenter. 此标记指定具有白色背景内容显示器来模拟的外观的标准窗口周围的边框。This markup specifies a border with a white background around the content presenter to emulate the appearance of a standard window. 它还指定绑定到 WindowNonClientFrameThickness 属性，用于获取帧的默认系统宽度的边距。It also specifies a margin that is bound to the WindowNonClientFrameThickness property, which gets the default system width for the frame. ``` ``` 由 WindowChrome 类; 不显示的应用程序图标和标题它们具有要添加到作为自定义内容的边框。The application icon and title are not displayed by the WindowChrome class; they have to be added to the border as custom content. 下面的 XAML 将添加的映像和 textblock 要显示的图标和标题。The following XAML adds an image and a textblock to display the icon and title. 这两个元素窗口上绑定到相应的属性。Both elements are bound to the corresponding properties on the window. 图像宽度绑定到 SmallIconSize 宽度，后者将获取图标的默认系统大小。The image width is bound to the SmallIconSize width, which gets the default system size for the icon. IsHitTestVisibleInChrome 附加属性设置在图像上，以便它可以接收鼠标事件。The IsHitTestVisibleInChrome attached property is set on the image so that it can receive mouse events. ``` ```
